name: 50/50 Martini
preparation:
This cocktail is made with equal proportions of spirit and vermouth. Some swear by gin in their 50/50s, but it’s great with vodka, because it doesn’t compete with the subtle aromatics of the vermouth.

Stir the vodka and vermouth in a mixing glass with ice.

Strain into a chilled coupe.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
